'''Illuminating Lightning''' is a [[Character Event Wish]] with the 5 Star [[Character]] "Candlebearer, Shadowhunter" [[Clorinde]] ({{Electro}}) as the promoted character with an increased chance to be obtained.

{{Wish History Table|Illuminating Lightning}}

==Trivia==
* The first occurrence of this Wish Series ran alongside an [[Epitome Invocation]] Wish featuring [[Absolution]], a weapon tailored to Clorinde's gameplay mechanics.
